channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023101267
item.description:
Report X-2023101267

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UNKNOWN. WAS CALLED TO THE AREA FOR LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. NOTICED LEAKAGE CAME OUT FROM THE HANDLE OF THE FIBERBOARD BOX. OPENED BOX TO FIND LEAKAGE COMING FROM THE CLOSURE OF THE TOP LID. DescribePack: LEAKAGE CAME FROM CLOSURE OF TOP LID. NO HOLES THAT WHERE SEEN. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ABSORBENT

item.title: Report X-2023101109
item.description:
Report X-2023101109

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection it was found that a 2.5 liter bottle of Diversey Glance HC glass and multi surface cleaner had a loose closure which caused leakage. DescribePack: a 2.5 liter bottle of Diversey Glance HC glass and multi surface cleaner had a loose closure which caused leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in a hazmat lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023101063
item.description:
Report X-2023101063

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: HOMESTEAD
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX GROUND PACKAGE SYSTEM, I
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO QA, UPON INSPECTION LOOSE CAP. NOT EN OUGH PACKING MATERIAL USED. A LOT OF NEGATIVE SPACE ALLOWING CONTENTS TO SHIFT ON IMPACT. BOTTLE CAP NOT SECURED AND NOT PACKED WELL ENOUGH TO PREVENT MOVEMENT UPON IMPACT. DescribePack: LOOSE CAP DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PUT INSIDE HAZMAT TOTE AND STORED IN HAZMAT CAGE

item.title: Report X-2023101044
item.description:
Report X-2023101044

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: PALMETTO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found to be leaking when the driver unloaded from his truck and attempted delivery. The package was placed back inside the truck. DescribePack: Two of the bottles have loose caps but it appears that only one actually leaked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed back inside the truck and away from the other packages inside the truck.

item.title: Report X-2023101027
item.description:
Report X-2023101027

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I was alerted of a leaking package with a strong odor outside the building under the tent. I arrived at the scene with a red tote and HazMat bag. However, when I attempted to move the box, blue liquid poured out all over underneath the conveyor belt and onto the cement/road. It was such a strong odor that I couldn't stay by the area after collecting the box. It was then placed inside the HazMat Cage. DescribePack: One cap was off from a 2.5 Liter plastic jug. All of it came out. The box became unfolded by the spill. No seal under cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: A red tote and HazMat bag were used to remove the box from the area. It was put inside the HazMat Cage.

item.title: Report X-2023101015
item.description:
Report X-2023101015

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: DEFUNIAK SPRINGS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. received off trailer 821757, wet. Pkg. placed in bin and taken to QA for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspecting contents, it was noted that the plastic container was leaking from the bottom, no issue with cap. There was no protection material inside. Orientation arrows on side of box. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. sitting in the HMPA awaiting instructions from PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023100933
item.description:
Report X-2023100933

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-07
  • City: DEFUNIAK SPRINGS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023100933: SequenceEvent: Pkg. was received wet off trailer 831431; taken to QA cage for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspection the contents, it was noted that both 1 gal containers had loose caps, causing liquid to leak out. There were no materials inside to protect the container and no orientation arrows on the side of the box. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed in the HMPA awaiting instructions from PGH. X-2023100934: SequenceEvent: Pkg. received wet off trailer 831431; taken to QA cage for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspecting contents, it was noted that both containers had loose caps, causing liquid to leak out. There were no materials inside to protect the containers and no orientation arrows on the side of the pkg. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. sitting in the HMPA awaiting instructions from PGHJ. X-2023100936: SequenceEvent: Pkg. received wet off trailer 831431; pkg. taken to QA cage for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspecting contents, it was noted that both containers had loose caps, causing liquid to leak out. There were no materials inside to protect contents and no orientation arrows on the side of the pkg. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. sitting in the HMPA awaiting instructions from PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023100812
item.description:
Report X-2023100812

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A fiberboard box with signs of release was discovered during sort operations at the TPAR facility. The fiberboard box contained one plastic container inside and the cap had come loose causing a spill inside of the fiberboard box. All contents were placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report X-2023100914
item.description:
Report X-2023100914

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-07
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was found on a pallet outside the HazMat Cage with noticeable signs of past leakage. It was put inside the HazMat Cage using a red tote and HazMat bag. Strangely, the driver marked it delivered from the previous day. DescribePack: The bottom was soaked while the top was stained from previous leakage. Two caps were loose. DurationRel: 14 and MitigateEffect: It was moved into the HazMat Cage using a red tote and a HazMat bag.

item.title: Report X-2023100896
item.description:
Report X-2023100896

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: WEST PALM BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered during the preload sort and was immediately removed from trailer and sent to QA for inspection and to avoid damaging any other packages. DescribePack: it seems during transit the cap loosed due to improper handing resulting in the package slowly leaking until its discovery this moring. (10/6/23) DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: immediately removed from trailer and placed in damage hazmat bin to avoid any further damages or injuries.

item.title: Report X-2023100888
item.description:
Report X-2023100888

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100888 SequenceEvent: The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The cap on one of the jugs in the box was loose, causing contents to leak out. The seal under the cap did not stop the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote. 2. X-2023100890 SequenceEvent: The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: One of the jugs in the box was leaking contents from under the cap, even though the cap was on tight. the seal under the cap did not stop the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023100839
item.description:
Report X-2023100839

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of Alligare diquat herbicide 2.5 gallon was leaking due to a defective lid. The lid was secured but was still leaking. Shipping label was covering the Corrosive diamond & had no OP-900 on box. DescribePack: Bottle was leaking due to a defective lid. The lid was secured but was still leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of Siemens Sample Probe Cleaner 2.4-liter had small dent & hole at bottom of bottle resulted to leakage & stained contents. Contents corrosive but outer box doesn't have hazmat diamond or OP-900. DescribePack: Bottle had small dent & hole at bottom of bottle resulted to leakage & stained contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

HE STOPPED THE FLOW OF THE PACKAGE AND PLACED IT IN A SPILL TRAY LINED WITH ZEP. RESPONDER TOOK THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA TO BE PROCESSED.

item.title: Report X-2023100415
item.description:
Report X-2023100415

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: MIAMI
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE SPILL WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING DURING SORT OPERATIONS. INNER CONTENTS: 5 GLASS BOTTLES, 2 LEAKED. CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM AND HELD PENDING DISPOSITION FROM THE SHIPPER.
